message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially even more than $1000000. While I can't disclose all the details right now, I'm confident this could be a game-changer for you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000.  This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1000000.  Let me know if you're interested, and we can discuss it further.
